leftColumn.name: M. Diki Fahriza
leftColumn.description: Hi, welcome! Here I've gathered various projects, experiments, and exciting ideas I've worked onâ€”from auction apps, interactive games, to small things born from curiosity. I believe learning doesn't require genius, just consistency and determination. Let's explore my thoughts and works together!

aboutPage.title: M. Diki Fahriza
aboutPage.subtitle: Coffee Lover, Web Developer, and Digital Experimenter
aboutPage.bio: Hello! I'm M. Diki Fahriza, a web developer who loves exploring various digital technologies. For the past few years, I've worked on various personal projects ranging from simple management systems to interactive web-based applications. My interest in the world of technology is shaped by high curiosity and a passion for constantly trying new things.
aboutPage.bio2: Outside the world of development, I am active as a farmer and breeder, and involved in social activities and democratic oversight work. I believe that the digital world and real life can go hand in hand to create a better future.

timeline.description: Managing small-scale farming and livestock activities using a sustainable experimental approach for better efficiency and productivity.
Supporting election monitoring tasks at the subdistrict level to uphold the integrity of local democracy.
Working on freelance digital projects, including translation, writing, and building static and dynamic websites.
Currently pursuing a degree in Informatics Engineering, focusing on programming, application development, and web technologies.
Developed an interest in technology and critical thinking through academic and organizational activities.
Studied basic Islamic knowledge and began engaging in independent learning and technology exploration.
Completed primary education while cultivating discipline and spiritual values.

hobbies: Reading books and articles on various topics
